title: Biden warns schools should not be 'turned into prisons'
Trump, Pence call for hardening schools with armed officers
McConnell maneuvers around Trump in dance of GOP heavyweights
description: The Senate Republican leader sees a Trump nomination as complicating the task of defeating Joe Biden next year, according to confidantes. So he's executing his own end-around.

title: Why this week’s media meltdown was years in the making — and what comes next
description: Ben Smith, former top editor at Buzzfeed News, on the origins of today’s media crisis, and what hope — if any — there is for a future where Americans can agree on basic facts.

title: The one big advantage Ron De$antis has: Tons and tons of cash
description: Despite recent stumbles, the potential Trump challenger sits on a mountain of money.

title: Baby showers, icicle music and sauna time: How embassy parties have become the new K Street
description: The embassy scene has come roaring back post-pandemic as D.C.’s diplomatic set races to make up for lost time.

title: The nation’s cartoonists on the week in politics
description: Every week political cartoonists throughout the country and across the political spectrum apply their ink-stained skills to capture the foibles, memes, hypocrisies and other head-slapping events in the world of politics. The fruits of these labors are hundreds of cartoons that entertain and enrage readers of all political stripes. Here's an offering of the best of this week's crop, picked fresh off the Toonosphere. Edited by Matt Wuerker.
